name: Fraggin Halls VR
description:
A Fast Pace Virtual Reality shooter developed on HTC Vive. The Game is inspired by the ever present close quarters hallway shootouts that exist is virtually every Sci-Fi movie and TV series.

Features:

-Arcade style fast paced heart pounding gameplay
-Team and Player vs Enemy team Sandbox Arena Gameplay
-Choose Player Team, Choose Enemy Team, Choose Arena and Fight!
-Multiple Races, Weapons Sets, and Arenas to choose from with more to come.
-Practice Range to hone your skills
-Large variety of play weapons
-Advanced Ragdoll and Environmental physics.
-Detailed Dynamic Environments
